system.description:
A demon that has perfected witchcraft. Attracted to places of powerful sorceries, and wishes to destroy all witchcraft. Weaker mortals might create pacts with this demon to access sorcery.

(The stats provided here is for a Rank 1 encounter. Check the book for higher ranks.)
system.attacks:
Inflict Violence: Sulfur. Attack an enemy in range 5 with Faith, setting them aflame and poisoning them.

Gambits [[/r d6]]

1-2: Rush > Inflict Violence > Inflict Violence

3-4: Rush > Enrage [1]: Choose a fighter in range 3. They suffer -2 to all Defenses but +2 to all attacks until the end of their next riff > Inflict Violence

5: Rush > Witchpact [2]: Choose up to 2 different fighters in burst 5. They must attack with an inflict violence.

6: Rush > Blood Rope [1]: Connect two fighters or objects within range 5 of the Witch Demon to each other. A rope of blood binds them together: they cannot move further from each other. They must take time to remove the rope.

traits.name: Fester
traits.description: At the start of Resound 2+, all demons fester: their unique trait triggers and they gain +1d to all attacks until the end of the Resound. They fester every start of Resound afterwards.

traits.name: Atrocious Residue
traits.description: When a Demon is Defeated, they discorporate and roll 1 Attack Die on all enemies in the battlefield. Unless the battlefield is purified or cleansed by proper rituals, they will rise again after eighty seven days.

traits.name: Violent Devil God
traits.description: At the start of a Resound, if there are exactly 3 demons left in the battlefield, they may combine into a Violent Devil God: choose one demon as the main body. Add all remaining HP together, and the main body gains +1 to all Prowesses and becomes Size 3.

traits.name: Antigod
traits.description: All demons are vulnerable to anything that might sear away corruption and darkness.

traits.name: Pact
traits.description: When the witch hits a fighter, they can form a pact with the fighter until the end of the fighter's next riff. The fighter with a pact cannot directly attack the Witch. When the witch festers, they bleed all enemies in the battlefield. Already bleeding enemies suffer poison.
